amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to ensure high-risk borrowers and borrowers who are applying for zero down-payment loans to receive housing counsel.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 110-330 to require the Secretary to ensure that the mortgagor receives counseling at the time of application.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tiberi amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
